title: Elon Musk says Nasa can give SpaceX rivals its technology for free
text:
SpaceX founder Elon Musk has claimed that he would be happy to hand rivals like Sir Richard Branson’s Virgin Galactic, Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin and Boeing his rocket company’s intellectual property, “for free”.

The pledge came during a press conference at SpaceX’s headquarters in Los Angeles to address delays to Nasa’s first crewed mission to space in eight years. It has been paying Russia to send astronauts to the International Space Station instead, at the cost of $85 million (£68m).

Mr Musk said: “I want to be clear. Nasa can share all of our intellectual property with anyone that Nasa wants. Nasa can have it all. Share it with anyone.”

He later added that “any SpaceX data should not be considered...
description: SpaceX founder Elon Musk has claimed that he would be happy to hand rivals like Sir Richard Branson’s Virgin Galactic, Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin and Boeing his rocket company’s intellectual property, “for free”.
